attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Create IOS XR 7.0.1 MDT config for incident response: stream IPv4 ACL telemetry statistics with higher cadence using ipv4-acl-oper sensor paths. Use gRPC no TLS. Server 192.0.2.187 port 57500. Sample every 30 seconds."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"response": "telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group INCIDENT-RESPONSE
  sensor-path ipv4-acl-oper/acl-statistics
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.187
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription INCIDENT-RESPONSE-SUB
  sensor-group-id INCIDENT-RESPONSE sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"}
